name: Spring Couscous Salad
description: This super easy vegan spring couscous salad is perfect for busy weekday dinners as well as for picnics and BBQs. It's ready to eat in about 15 minutes!

recipeInstructions.text: Prepare the couscous according to the instructions on the package.
recipeInstructions.name: Prepare the couscous according to the instructions on the package.

recipeInstructions.text: Cut the vegetables into small pieces.
recipeInstructions.name: Cut the vegetables into small pieces.

recipeInstructions.text: Add them to the couscous and stir in the oil, vinegar, and fresh herbs. Season with salt and pepper.
recipeInstructions.name: Add them to the couscous and stir in the oil, vinegar, and fresh herbs. Season with salt and pepper.
